title: Red Carpet - Vip al tappeto
overview: Herbert Ballerina, Brenda Lodigiani, Antonio Ornano, Awed, Ginevra Fenyes, Pierluca Mariti, Michela Giraud, Gabriele Vagnato, and Francesco Arienzo are the bodyguards in the first edition of "Red Carpet Survival." The best team, at the end of the four episodes, will win the coveted Golden Pigeon. Alessia Marcuzzi will lead the bodyguards. Commenting on it all are the voices of Gialappa's Band.
